meanings.definition: Having the quality of sticking or adhering.
meanings.sent1: The stickiest glue held the paper together tightly.
meanings.sent2: The candy was so sticky that it was the stickiest thing I had ever touched.
meanings.sent3: The stickiest situation arose when the cat got stuck to the tape.
meanings.sent4: Her loyalty was the stickiest bond that kept the group together.
meanings.sent5: The stickiest mud on the trail made it hard to walk through.

meanings.sent1: The stickiest candy in the jar was the most popular among the kids.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, the ground became the stickiest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The stickiest situation was when the balloons got stuck to the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: Her love was the stickiest emotion that held their relationship together.
meanings.sent5: The stickiest tape held the broken pieces of the vase perfectly.
